code: import React from"react";import"./ListDates.scss";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ListDates(props){function goToBuyTicket(e){props.formRoute(e.target.parentNode.dataset.date);}function formDaysList(){var dates=props.dates;var dateList=[];var days=["Нд","Пн","Вт","Ср","Чт","Пт","Сб"];var key=0;for(var i=0;i<dates.length;i++){var currentDay=new Date("2021-".concat(dates[i][1],"-").concat(dates[i][0])).getDay();dateList.push(getDay(dates[i][0],days[currentDay],key,dates[i][1]));key++;}return dateList;}function getDay(date,day,key,month){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"day","data-date":[date,month],onClick:goToBuyTicket,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"day__date",children:date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"day__name",children:day})]},key);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"days",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"days__title",children:"\u041E\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0456\u0442\u044C \u0434\u0435\u043D\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"days__list",children:formDaysList()})]});}
